channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Should you buy Apple’s stock after earnings? These analysts see better options.
item.description: Apple sees iPhone trends improving, but analysts note its stock is more expensive than other hardware and smartphone plays like Qualcomm and Alphabet.

item.title: AI might not take your job after all — and you can use it to your advantage
item.description: Venture capitalist Hemant Taneja: AI won’t just build on the internet boom — it will be bigger.

item.title: Still no sign of surging layoffs despite Amazon, UPS job cuts
item.description: State jobless claims point to a soft-but-stable labor market.

item.title: Amazon’s stock soars as earnings show ‘the AI narrative has flipped positive’
item.description: Investors were worried AWS was falling behind in AI. A new growth trajectory has restored confidence in Amazon’s cloud business.

item.title: It's a high-risk trade, but this biotech down 80% this year could be a buy
item.description: Jay Woods breaks down the charts on Sarepta.

item.description: Here are Friday's biggest calls on Wall Street.

item.title: Goldman Sachs raises Nvidia price target ahead of AI giant's next earnings report
item.description: The bank maintained its buy rating and lifted its price target on Nvidia heading into the chipmaker's next earnings release, slated for Nov. 19.

item.title: Cloud revenue is sending Amazon shares soaring. Here’s what analysts had to say
item.description: Cloud growth has been a widely watched metric for the company as rivals such as Google and Microsoft ramp up the pressure.
